void eval ()

Detailed Description

named_stub_question named questions in the qscript language become object instantiations of this class.

Below is an example of a named_stub_question - the allowed codes are a predefined name like "age" below

q3 "Q3. Respondents age" sp int32_t age;

Member Function Documentation

void named_stub_question::generate_code ( ostringstream &  quest_defns,
ostringstream &  program_code 
) [virtual]

generate_code(): Pure virtual functions takes 2 streams which as parameters code is written to both the streams the code in the quest_defns stream appears before the code in the program_code stream

Implements question.
